Reviews.Title: Battery Hog
Reviews.Author: Madhatter1974
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my neice this past Christmas.  The pictures weren't always the best quality and she had to change the batteries 3 times in 2 days.  We returned it and bought a different camera that she still uses.

Reviews.Title: Shakes too much
Reviews.Author: H. Erskine
Reviews.Content: Although there is an anti-shake option, it minimally works.  I am in the process of returning this camera, very disappointed.

ProductInfo.Features:
5.1 Megapixel Resolution
2.4" Screen
Antishake
8X Digital Zoom
SD Card Support up to 8 GB
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar Vivicam 5024 5.1MP Digital Camera, 8x Digital Zoom, 2.4" Screen, SD Card - Blue
